monster.name: Undying Gray Warden
languages: Common and any two other languages,

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The undying gray warden has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The undying gray warden has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the undying gray warden hits with it.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the undying gray warden's darkvision.

trait.name: Fiendish Blessing
entries: The AC of the undying gray warden includes its Charisma bonus.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the undying gray warden fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a short or long rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the undying gray warden can regain 20 hit points.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The undying gray warden is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the undying gray warden to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the undying gray warden drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Reckless Charge
entries: The warden can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature.

legendary.name: Twin Bladed Barrage
entries: The warden makes two longsword attacks.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The warden adds a +4 bonus to its AC for the triggering attack.
